Content: Sri Lanka Freedom Party General Secretary Rohana Lakshman Piyadasa says that the United Peoplesâ€™ Alliance has the power of the majority and they are prepared to contest an election at any time. Professor Rohana Lakshman Piyadasa said this during a discussion with a group of members who were elected to the Kandy Municipal Council. SLFP electoral seat organizer Mahinda Abeykoon was present on the occasion. Professor Rohana Lakshman said that the President has prorogued the parliament until the 16th of this month. He said that the Speaker can make a request to the President to convene the parliament but only the President has the power to do so.
